p: Previous studies showed there are phenolic compounds in dried RC leaves which have strong antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and antimicrobial activities ( Singh et al., 2009 ; Jena and Gupta, 2012). However, limited research and discussion exists on the effects of RC leaf supplementation in animal feed. Thus, the purpose of this paper was to evaluate the influence of RC leaf supplementation on production performance, egg quality, and antioxidant status of laying hens.
